ol.li:

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.138"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="692304728"/> <code code="72114-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Complaint type"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="2014333176"/> </observation>
